about_the_game:
Halloween is finally upon us! This year, the full moon has upset the balance between our world and the ghostly realm.
A set of tackle with magic runes prepared by the druids will help to catch the most cunning underwater demons. The Hellfish Fighter Pack includes: three enchanted fishing rods and three reels made of unique materials, a fishing rod stand made of sticks and skulls, groundbaits for all kinds of spooky creatures, secret baits for predatory spirit fish, and even a Hell's Bell to summon a demon.
The secret of successful Halloween fishing lies in special tackle! Show all ghosts and demons the true master of the ancient magical knowledge and power!

Hellfish Fighter Pack includes:
* 666 CREDITS
* 13 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 60 Slots
* 3 Tackle Setup Slots
* 3 Recipe Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Humerus 11' 1" (340) - Length: 11' 1" (3.4 m); Casting Weight: 6 1/3 – 10 1/5 Oz (180–290 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 37.5 – 72.7 Lb (17–33 kg)
* Tibia 13' 10" (420) - Length: 13' 9" (4.2 m); Casting Weight: 3 7/8 – 8 1/12 Oz (110–230 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 15.4–58.4 Lb (7–26.5 kg)
* Femur 12' 7" (385) - Length: 12' 7" (3.85 m); Casting Weight: 4 2/5 – 10 1/19 Oz (125–285 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 17.6–48.5 Lb (8–22 kg)

Reels:
* Ossibus Blue 11000 - Capacity: Mono 73/123 (0.8/123), Braid 44/343 (0.32/343); Max Drag: 70.5 Lb (32 kg); Drag: Front
* Ossibus Red 10000 - Capacity: Mono 38.5/180 (0.55/180), Braid 44/310 (0.32/310); Max Drag: 57.7 Lb (26.2 kg); Drag: Front
* Ossibus Green 8500 - Capacity: Mono 32/170 (0.5/170), Braid 30/300 (0.28/300); Max Drag: 46.2 Lb (21 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 500 yd (500 m):
* Braid .013" (0.32 mm) - Test: 69.5 Lb (31.5 kg)
* Braid .011" (0.29 mm) - Test: 57 Lb (25.9 kg)
* Fluoro .025" (0.65 mm) - Test: 44 Lb (20 kg)

* Mono Leader .025" (0.62mm) (x15) - Length: 2 yd (2 m); Test: 65.5 Lb (29.75 kg)
* Carp Leader 56 Lb (25.4 kg) (x10) - Length: 0.5 yd (0.5 m); Test: 56 Lb (25.4 kg)

* Carp Hooks: #2 (x10), #1 (x10), #1/0 (x10), #2/0 (x10), #4/0 (x10), #6/0 (x10), #8/0 (x10)
* Hooks: #10 (x10), #1/0 (x10), #2/0 (x10), #4/0 (x10), #6/0 (x10), #7/0 (x10), #5/0 (x10)

* Terminal Tackle: Sinker 7 Oz. (200 g) (x2), Carp Camouflage Sinker 4 3/4 Oz. (135 g) (x2), Hell's Bell (x2), Coffin-Spod
* Lures: Frog-Demon 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #5/0, Fire Opal Jerkbait 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #8/0, Vampire Mouse Lure 1 5/7 Oz. (48 g), #7/0, Charoite Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x5), Rainbow Slug 4" (10 cm) (x10), Burying Beetle Larva 4" (10 cm) (x10)
* Baits: Candy (x31), Dead Mice (x21), Pig's Eye (x21), Rotten Minnows (x21)
* Baits: Infernal Crab (x20), Hell Frog (x15), Fire Salamander (x10), Clam Shells (x20), Firefly Larva (x20), Ghost Worm (x50), Ghost Moth (x20)
* Boilies: Mistletoe Berries (x10), Woodlice (x10), Dead Eyes (x20), Dung Balls (x10), Century Eggs (x10), Chopped Fingers (x20), Phalanges (x20)
* Groundbaits: Ghost Groundbait (x3), Infernal Groundbait (x3), Witch Groundbait (x3)


EQUIPMENT
* MagFin Iron Maiden Fish Stringer - Max Single Fish Weight: 99 Lb (45 kg); Total Fish Weight: 286 Lb (130 kg)
* Two-Horned Rod Stand - Rod Slot: 2; Stand Count: 1; Bite Alarm: No


ADVANCED FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Oregon
North Carolina
Florida
California
Michigan
Louisiana
Czech
Italy
United Kingdom
Mississippi


POND PASSES (7 days):
Falcon Lake
Neherrin River
Everglades
San Joaquin Delta
Saint-Croix Lake
Quanchkin Lake
Lesní Víla Fishery
Tiber River
Weeping Willow Fisheries
Blue Crab Island

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
